entry.title: README
entry.content:
hi,
I want to introduce the basic function of ucas_zhangqian.
Currently the site is divided into 5 sections.

  • Part one has background information on HPV and cervical squamous cell carcinoma. Including, but not limited to, profiles of HPV, cervical cancer formation, and epidemiological characteristics.
  • There is tumor microenvironment information in part two. This part will contain published tumorigenesis mechanisms and the cellular components and characteristics of the tumor microenvironment.
  • Part three is related to sequencing techiques and commonly used software tutorials.
  • Part four is about the use of single cell sequencing and spatial transcriptome sequencing. We will focus on their analysis ideas.
  • Part five contains the latest paper related to the our research in this week.

In addition, all articles mentioned in this website can be accessed in pdf format by clicking on the hyperlink without manual download.
Update Time: every Sunday at 10 am.

For any questions, please contact zhangqian223@mails.ucas.ac.cn.
Best wishes,
Qian
